question: Max Financial Services and Max Life Insurance appointed whom as the Director?
explanation: Sahil Vachani Appointed as Director on the Boards of Max Financial Services and Max Life Insurance. He was also recently appointed to the Board of Directors of MFS' subsidiary Max Life Insurance, effective 18th May 2018. Sahil has joined the Boards of these companies as a representative of the Owner Sponsor Group led by Mr. Analjit Singh. He joined the Max Group in 2016 with a focus on creating a powerful Real Estate brand - Max Estates and steering Max Ventures' other businesses towards growth
